Title: Baptism by Fire
Plot: Kavanaugh acquires what he needs in order to apprehend Vic who is preoccupied with getting revenge on Guardo.  Claudette finds herself under the political microscope as a result of the San Marcos incident, and Danny receives some news about her future at the Barn.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Forest Whitaker, David Marciano, Paula Garcés, Onahoua Rodriguez, Lela Loren, Al Israel, Jordi Caballero, Miguel Nájera
